channel.title: Nim on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Nim on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Use nim with Jupyter
item.description: # <i class='fa fa-circle'> Let's use nim It looks like nim is fast It seems to be similar to Python, so let’s try it. There is no Jupyter kernel. I made it with docker. How to execute To install docker, see Install Docker Engine. If you execute the following, Jupyter will start. docker run -it --rm -p 8888:8888 tsutomu7/nim Open “docker host IP address:8888” in your browser. Select “nim” from “New” in the upper right.
